784160.name: NASCAR Heat 2 - 2018 Season Update
784160.description:
New track. New drivers. New 2018 Season Update.

The Roval has arrived. Part road course and part oval, the Charlotte Roval creates racing never seen before! Race on this one-of-a-kind track before anyone else. 2018 paint schemes, an updated driver roster and race schedule, and new drivers are also included for the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series. Finally, compete in the all-new 2018 Chevrolet Camaro in the 2018 Season Update. Ready to race?

Download the 2018 Season Update for NASCAR Heat 2 today!

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
